text: In Marxism, the petite bourgeoisie (or petty bourgeoisie) is the social class made up of small merchants and peasants who own land. The term comes from French and means "small bourgeoisie".Petite bourgeoisie - Oxford Reference. Retrieved 25 May 2021."Encyclopaedia of Marxism – Glossary". Retrieved 6 March 2013. Unlike the bourgeoisie, they do not own the means of production.The Communist Manifesto – Chapter 1. Retrieved 6 March 2013. However, they try to be like the bourgeoisie. ==References== Category:Marxism Category:Social classes
title: Petite bourgeoisie
